page.title: 09Grange Farm,Tiptree
page.content: I went to Grange Farm to do an interview.It is along Grange Road in the West part of Tiptree.Tiptree is famous for its strawberries.Grange Farm has grown strawberries since 1930.From 1884 strawberries have been grown on that land but it was called Villa Farm.People work from April until August.I asked a couple of workers questions about their job.I asked them,why they worked there,what do you do?Is there something about the job you really enjoy doing?How many years have you worked here?Do you like strawberries?Mrs.Bunting answered:- I know the farmer and it is nice seasonal work.I weigh and sell strawberries.Meeting people who visit the farm.14 years.Yes.Mrs.Seaber:- Because it fits in with family life. Pick strawberries.Being out in the open air.8 years.Yes.
